label: AB_oC8_63_c_c-001
title: CrB ($B33$) Structure
comments:
(Gottfried, 1938) originally gave the $B33$ {\em Strukturbericht} designation to thallium iodide, TiI. Later, (Smithells, 1955) gave CrB structure the new designation $B_{f}$. These structures are identical, and we follow (Parth\'{e}, 1993) in using $B33$ to designate both structures. 
 Removing either the Cr or B atoms transforms this into the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_oC4_63_c-001}{$\alpha$-U (A20)} structure. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oC8_63_c_c-004}{$\beta$-SnS} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oC8_63_c_c-001}{CrB ($B33$)} have the same AFLOW label, AB\_oC8\_63\_c\_c.  The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
